definition: A localized collection of pus within a tissue, typically caused by an infection, often requiring medical intervention such as drainage or surgical removal. It is commonly found in various parts of the body and can cause pain, swelling, and inflammation.

examples.english: The abscess was filled with pus.

examples.german: Der Abszes bildete sich nach einer Infektion.
examples.english: The abscess formed after an infection.
The abscess had to be drained.
